tutorProfilesSection.title: Get to Know a Selection of Our Tutors
tutorProfilesSection.description: Here's a curated cross-section of our team to give you a sense of the calibre and diversity of educators available across each of our tutoring tiers. While this is just a glimpse, our full team spans every age, subject and academic stage‚Äîfrom Year 1 phonics to postgraduate-level Astrophysics. If you don't see exactly what you're looking for here, rest assured we have the right expert behind the scenes, ready to support your child's learning journey. To begin, simply complete our short enquiry form, and a member of our team will be in touch to start the conversation.

alma-maths-science.name: Alma
alma-maths-science.title: Maths & Science Specialist

experience.description: 10,000+ hours of online tutoring with classroom experience across independents, grammars, academies & state schools

achievements.title: Official Examiner
achievements.description: Examiner for GCSE & A Level Maths and Science

achievements.title: IB Expert
achievements.description: International Baccalaureate (IB) expert

achievements.title: Extensive Teaching Experience
achievements.description: Classroom experience across independents, grammars, academies & state schools

alma-maths-science.bio: Alma holds a First-Class MSci in Astrophysics from UCL, a PGCE in Secondary Maths from IoE, and studied Cognitive Psychology at Cambridge. As an official examiner for GCSE & A Level Maths and Science, she brings 10,000+ hours of online tutoring experience with classroom expertise across independents, grammars, academies & state schools.

testimonial.quote: She's making a huge difference to both my kids‚Ä¶ they come away from lessons really buoyant.
testimonial.author: Parent

teachingStyle.approach: Scientific and methodical, building understanding through practical application

amy-english.bio: Amy holds an LLB (Hons) Law degree and PGCE Secondary English qualification. As Head of English and Media Studies and official examiner for GCSE & A Level English, she has established a proven record of rapid grade improvement with her students.

testimonial.quote: Jake has jumped from a U to two marks off a B ‚Äì incredible progress in just a month.
testimonial.author: Parent

teachingStyle.approach: Analytical and supportive, focusing on rapid improvement through targeted techniques

image.alt: Emily - Entrance Exam Expert, History & Politics

emily-entrance-history.bio: Emily holds a BA History from Cambridge and PGCE from Oxford. As a former teacher at Latymer, Merchant Taylors, and North London Collegiate, she serves as an official 11+ examiner and GCSE/A Level/IB examiner for History & Politics. Her students consistently win places at top schools including Eton, Harrow, and other prestigious institutions.

testimonial.quote: Offers from St Paul's, Westminster, Highgate and UCS. We can't believe it!
testimonial.author: Parent

teachingStyle.approach: Elite preparation with strategic entrance exam technique and historical analysis

testimonial.quote: So patient, kind and encouraging. Charlie is so proud of his 11+ offers (as are we!).

testimonial.quote: I got a 9 in Portuguese and an 8 in Spanish ‚Äì amazing after being told I'd struggle to get a 7!

ophelia-classics.bio: Ophelia holds a BA Classics from Cambridge University. She specialises in 11+ and entrance exam preparation with success across elite schools including Harrow and Westminster. She provides Oxbridge personal statement and interview coaching, with proven ability to improve student scores dramatically.

testimonial.quote: Without Ophelia there is no way I would have won my place at Cambridge.

teachingStyle.approach: Classical education with strategic entrance exam preparation and university coaching

testimonial.quote: Seb comes out of lessons beaming ‚Äì I caught him teaching his friends Annoushka's times tables tricks!

As a British & US admissions expert with Oxbridge & Ivy League success, Alex is a top 1% SAT scorer with 10,000+ tutoring hours and specialises in multiple qualification systems including SAT, LNAT, IB, A-level, IGCSE, AP, and HSC.

testimonial.quote: I got 28 in my LNAT and a UCL offer ‚Äì please tell him thank you so much!
